text: You built a custom ML model using scikit-learn. Training time is taking longer than expected. You decide to migrate your model to Vertex AI Training, and you want to improve the modelâ€™s training time. What should you try out first?

choices.text: Migrate your model to TensorFlow, and train it using Vertex AI Training.

Train your model with DLVM images on Vertex AI, and ensure that your code utilizes NumPy and SciPy internal methods whenever possible.
